column5: Massey Universityâ€™s Master of Management (International Business) is suitable for those who have found themselves in a role that requires international business expertise, or if you have have studied a different business subject in your undergraduate qualification and want to specialise in this growing area.Our students come from a wide range of areas including business disciplines like marketing, economics, finance or supply chain, and other fields such as engineering, health, and information technology. They share a common desire to increase their understanding and expertise in international-business related skills and knowledge.
